Are the Space-Time Barrier and Flying Thunder God Technique similar to one another? I came across the difference between the Flying Thunder God Technique and Obito's Kamui Technique Transportation Technique, here.
But what I am struck with the fact that Fourth Hokage used a Space-Time Barrier tecnique to teleport Nine-Tail's Tailed Beast Ball. So my questions are:

Is Space-Time Barrier similar to Flying Thunder God Technique?
Is it used to transport things using Teleportation Technique?

What's the difference between Tobi's transportation jutsu and the teleportation jutsu used by the Fourth Hokage? In Naruto Shippuden, Minato Namikaze, the Fourth Hokage, used the teleportation technique (Hiraishin no Jutsu) . Tobi on the other hand uses the transportation technique (Kamui). 
How are the transportation jutsu and the teleportation jutsu different since both involve displacing stuff to other locations?
